company.Name: Ashton Gray Development LLC
company.Description: Vertically integrated real estate investment and development firm specializing in residential, commercial, land development, luxury homes, master-planned subdivisions, multifamily, retail centers, and senior living communities. Founded in 2009 (Texas operations since 2016), the company has delivered over $1.248 billion in project volume with 600+ active investors and maintains a 100% return of capital track record. The firm operates across Houston, Dallas, and Austin markets with expertise in development and construction that allows for broader project consideration and greater project control.

contacts.Description: Founder and President of Ashton Gray Development. Primary decision-maker and owner with authority over all company operations. Also serves as Registered Agent and Manager/Director. Founded the company with focus on luxury residential development, later expanding into commercial, land development, and master-planned communities. Over 15 years of real estate development experience.

Member, Director, President, Manager, and Managing Member of Ashton Gray Development LLC. Co-founder and key decision-maker with ownership stake. Also serves as director of affiliated entities including Ashton Gray Investments and Graystone Finance. Active since company formation with authority over strategic direction and operations.

Vice President of Ashton Gray Development since January 2017. Also serves as President of SVAG Construction and Co-founder/CEO of Ashton Gray Investments. Key executive with decision-making authority over development operations and investment strategy. Master of Science in Psychology from Capella University (2019-2022). Over 8 years with the organization.

Vice President of Land at Ashton Gray Development. Key decision-maker for land acquisition and development strategy. Quoted in Houston Business Journal regarding company's master-planned community developments including Oakwood Estates in Waller. Responsible for land banking and development pipeline management.

Vice President of Construction at Ashton Gray Development. Oversees all construction operations and project execution. Key decision-maker for construction strategy, vendor relationships, and project delivery. Responsible for quality control and construction management across the company's diverse portfolio.

Manager of Land Development at Ashton Gray Development. Promoted to this role from previous positions. Manages day-to-day land development operations, project coordination, and development execution. Works closely with VP of Land on development projects and master-planned communities.

Member of Ashton Gray Development LLC since company formation. Listed in Texas corporate filings as one of the managing members with ownership interest. Active member since 2020 with ongoing involvement in company operations and strategic decisions.

Member of Ashton Gray Development LLC. Listed in Texas corporate filings as one of the managing members with ownership interest. Active member since 2020 with ongoing involvement in company operations and strategic decisions.

Member of Ashton Gray Development LLC. Listed in Texas corporate filings as one of the managing members with ownership interest. Active member since 2020 with ongoing involvement in company operations and strategic decisions.

Member of Ashton Gray Development LLC. Listed in Texas corporate filings as one of the managing members with ownership interest. Member since 2024 with involvement in company operations and strategic decisions.

Member of Ashton Gray Development LLC. Listed in Texas corporate filings as one of the managing members with ownership interest. Member since March 2024 with involvement in company operations and strategic decisions.

sources_used: Texas Secretary of State corporate filings
Industry association directories (GHBA, Texas Association of Builders)
search_metadata.notes: Company information verified through multiple authoritative sources including Texas state corporate filings (File #0802566704). Executive team confirmed via company website and LinkedIn. Contact enrichment performed via EnformionGO for key executives. Company operates as Ashton Gray Development LLC (legal name) with DBA 'Graystone Residential'. Founded 2009, Texas LLC formed 10/20/2016. Status: IN EXISTENCE as of 02/06/2024. The company has 11-50 employees per LinkedIn, with 22 employees listed on company profile. Primary focus on Texas markets (Houston, Dallas, Austin) with $1.248B in project volume and 600+ active investors. Top executives (Shaun Vembutty, Sudharshan Vembutty, Sumi Rengaraj) have highest decision-making authority for real estate transactions. Also operates affiliated entities: SVAG Construction, SVAG Investments LLC, Ashton Gray Investments, and Latitude RE LLC.
